statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE payment_processed = TRUE;
SELECT claim_id, blockchain_transaction_id FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_name, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE payment_processed = TRUE AND claim_status <> 'rejected';
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_amount * 1.1 AS increased_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT policy_holder, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT policy_holder, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_processing ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT policy_holder, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_claims, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';

SELECT insurance_claims.policy_holder, payment_amount, payment_date, payment_status FROM insurance_claims JOIN payment_processing ON insurance_claims.claim_id = payment_processing.claim_id WHERE payment_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT policy_holder, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY policy_holder HAVING total_claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder, accident_date FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_method='bank transfer';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE status='approved' AND claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, status FROM insurance_claims WHERE accident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY accident_date DESC, policy_holder ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, status FROM insurance_claims WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT ic.policy_holder, p.payment_amount, p.payment_method FROM insurance_claims ic JOIN payments p ON ic.claim_id = p.claim_id WHERE p.payment_method = 'bank transfer';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT ic.*, bt.block_number FROM insurance_claims ic JOIN blockchain_transactions bt ON ic.claim_id = bt.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE claim_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_number FROM PolicyHolders ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, claim_id, payment_id, transaction_date FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT ph.policy_holder_name, pc.policy_number, pc.blockchain_id FROM PolicyHolders ph INNER JOIN InsuranceClaims ic ON ph.policy_number = ic.policy_number WHERE ic.claim_amount > 10000;

SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_amount, pt.transaction_date FROM Payments p INNER JOIN BlockchainTransactions pt ON p.payment_id = pt.payment_id WHERE p.payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY p.payment_amount DESC;

SELECT ic.policy_number, p.payment_id, pt.transaction_date FROM InsuranceClaims ic LEFT JOIN Payments p ON ic.claim_id = p.claim_id LEFT JOIN BlockchainTransactions pt ON p.payment_id = pt.payment_id WHERE ic.claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 10000;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_id='ABC123' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status='approved';
SELECT users.user_name, payment_history.payment_status FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id WHERE payment_history.payment_status='pending';

SELECT payments.payment_date, insurance_claims.claim_amount, users.user_name FROM payments JOIN insurance_claims ON payments.claim_id = insurance_claims.claim_id JOIN users ON payments.claim_id = insurance_claims.claim_id WHERE payments.payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payments.payment_date DESC;

SELECT insurance_claims.claim_id, insurance_claims.policy_id, payments.payment_amount FROM insurance_claims LEFT JOIN payments ON insurance_claims.claim_id = payments.claim_id WHERE payments.payment_amount IS NULL;
